DOC.brief_summary: The present study will explore the effectiveness of a computer based neurobehavioral intervention in alleviating symptoms and improving emotion regulation in psychiatric populations. It will increase understanding of psychopathology at a neural-circuit level and aid development of new non-pharmacological treatment for emotion regulatory deficits.
DOC.brief_title: Neurobehavioral Intervention as a Novel Treatment Approach for Emotion-Regulatory Deficits
DOC.criteria: current anxiety or depression symptoms internet access lifetime psychotic disorder, pastyear substance dependence
